short_summary: The procurement requires immediate purchase and delivery of CBRN protective gloves for the Canadian Armed Forces.
description: The Canadian Armed Forces requires the immediate purchase and delivery of CBRN protective gloves to address depleted national stock levels. The procurement includes the purchase of a kit containing an inner liner and an outer rubber glove, as well as individual liners of various sizes. The gloves are to be used for operational support, live agent training, and second-line support.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Overview
The Directorate of Soldier Systems Program Management, on behalf of the Canadian Armed Forces, has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure Chemical, Biological, Radioactive, and Nuclear (CBRN) Protective Gloves.

## Details
- **Contract Title:** CBRN Gloves
- **Contract Reference:** cb-215-22398509
- **Amendment Number:** 9
- **Solicitation Number:** W8486-238751/A
- **Publication Date:** 2023-10-24
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-29T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start/End Dates:** None
- **Tender Status:** Expired

## Description
The RFP seeks to purchase CBRN Protective Gloves to support military operations, live agent training, and second-line support. The gloves are to be purchased in two configurations:
- **Kit:** 8415-20-013-8919, consisting of an inner liner (8415-21-921-2540) and an outer rubber glove (8415-21-921-2163)
- **Individual Liners:** Various sizes, which are consumed more rapidly than the outer rubber glove

## Tender Conditions
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Delivery Regions:** Edmonton, Montréal, Alberta, and Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

## Attachments
The tender includes the following attachments:
- *Canadian Forces Standard for Identification Marking of Department of National Defence Materiel*
- *Department of National Defence Minimum Requirements for Commercial Packaging*
- *Specifications - Preservation, Storage, and Handling Instructions*
- *Specifications - Preparation of Provisioning Documentation for Canadian Armed Forces Equipment*

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
- Kurt Gricken
- Phone: (819) 939-6399
- Email: [kurt.gricken@forces.gc.ca](mailto:kurt.gricken@forces.gc.ca)

## Note
The tender has expired on 2024-02-29. If you require more information, please contact the above-mentioned contractor.
